links.*: Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode

wikitext.*:
'''''anto''''' is a noun meaning "mouth" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>

 [[Image:Anto.gif|left]]''Anto'' is also the name in Quenya of the thirteenth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  It is the first letter of the fourth grade or [[Tyellë]], which contains "voiced spirants" and it is the fourth letter in the dental or ''t''-series of consonants, the ''[[Tincotéma]]''.<ref name="Letters">{{App|Letters}}</ref>  In the standard spelling of Quenya ''Anto'' represents '''NT'''.<ref name="Names"/>  In all other modes this letter represents '''DH''' (or "voiced" '''TH''').<ref name="Letters"/>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Adho'''''.<ref>See ''[[Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode]]''</ref>
